name: Guardian Angel Earrings
description: Tini protectors with mighty powers. Made with love. Flameworked glass, sterling silver ear wire. Angels are about 15 mm (10/8 of an inch) tall, earring is 38mm top to bottom (1 1/2 inch) Perfect for any occasion.

name: I am a Night Owl
description:
A Little girl portrait, glass murine cane, made in 2013.
Edition of six pieces. The image is both sided, chain in sterling silver, 20 inches long, 30 mm dia, 4 mm thick.

name: Johnny Cash tribute necklace
description:
Glass Murine cane portrait of a legendary musician made between 2008-2013.
Edition of six pieces. The image is both sided, chain in sterling silver, 20 inches long, 31 mm dia, 4 mm thick.

name: Guardian Angel Necklace
description: Tini protector with mighty powers. Made with love. Flameworked glass, sterling silver chain. Angel is about 1/2 inch tall and chain is 20 inches long. Perfect for any occasion.

name: Lilly of the Walley Earrings
description: flameworked glass, sterling silver, drop about an inch, blossom dia 13 mm.

name: Bell flower earrings
description: flameworked glass, sterling silver, drop about an inch, blossom dia 14 mm.

name: Glass Stud earrings
description:
Discreetly happy. Flameworked glass, sterling silver, 4-5 mm
Glass is applied hot to sterling silver post, these will never come apart.

name: Canadian cored bead
description: I love Canada, Canadiana bead. Copper cored Canadian bead, cube shape, maple leaf and heart murrine cane on a bright red background. Made to fit popular charm bracelets. Price per one bead.

name: My Forest pendant
description:
Murrine (complex mosaic) Cane Pendant, "My Forest"
Flameworked Glass and silk ribbon. Limited numbered edition of 8.

Handmade in Tweed, Ontario,Canada by Artist Lucie Kovarova-Weir of Lunacy Glass Studio.
Lunacy Glass is small family based glass studio in Tweed, established in fall of 2002.

Main productions of Lunacy Glass are Flame worked glass beads, small objects and finished jewelry. They are all created with love and enthusiasm in original designs and small series.
